title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: He began his senior career at Bayern Munich, playing mostly in the club's reserve side before his 2013 transfer to Bayer Leverkusen. title: Emre Can
snippet: Can played for Eintracht’s youth team for three years (2006 to 2009) before moving to Bayern Munich’s U17 team. In Munich, he made his first appearance for the senior team on 12 August 2012 in a 2-1 Super Cup win against Borussia Dortmund. In 2013/14, he joined Bayer 04 Leverkusen and was ...

title: Emre Can | B. Dortmund | UEFA Champions League 2025/26 | UEFA.com
Emre Can facts for kids
snippet: He usually plays as a central midfielder, but he can also play as a defensive midfielder, centre-back, or full-back. He started his senior career at Bayern Munich. He mostly played for their reserve team before moving to Bayer Leverkusen in 2013.
